short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate featured snippets and code blocks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snippy is a simple featured snipped code generator for the HubSpot blog team. Writers enter the contents of their paragraph snippet, list snippet, or code block, and Snippy generates code which creates a featured snippet module in CMS Hub. This plugin is intended for use only by writers of the HubSpot blog team.
